about_the_game:
Welcome to the reality of Polish life, where everyday routines revolve around open conflicts with your neighbor, scheming, grilling, and finding ways to make your life easier—or making someone else's harder.

Each task in the game can be solved in multiple ways. It's up to you whether you go for quick and obvious solutions or come up with something more elaborate. Some methods will be apparent right away, but the most effective ones often require a bit of creativity to discover.

In Polish reality, it’s not about working hard but working smart! Save your time and energy—you might need them for other activities unless, of course, you get caught...


No true Pole skips a barbecue, and neither will you. Dive into various activities, like competing in a drinking duel—you've got to show your brother-in-law how it’s done, after all.


Life is a constant race for the best deals. Keep an eye on promotions, hunt for discounts, and grab the last items on the shelf before anyone else does. Remember, every zloty you save is one less for your nosy neighbor.


In this game, cleverness and creativity are your greatest weapons. Find unconventional solutions to the challenges ahead and show your neighbor who’s the real boss around here!

name: Polish Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-3320M @ 2.60 GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 3200u
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 5000+
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In Polish reality, cunning and creativity matter—solve tasks in various ways, save time, and show your neighbor who's in charge. Hunt for deals, organize barbecues, and prove that a true Pole always finds a way to make life easier for themselves and harder for their neighbor.
